attributes.action: Halt covid 19 vaccine programme for children.
attributes.additional_details: As the uk government move to push the covid 19 vaccinations on the children of our population there needs to be a discussion on the data published on the uk’s very own yellow card reporting system. To date there have been over 1600 deaths and over 1.5 million adverse reactions reported. These adverse reactions range from myocarditis, pericarditis, blood clotting abnormalities, neurological injury such as transverse myelitis, Bell’s palsy, guillian-barre syndrome and many more.
attributes.background: Halt the vaccination programme for children. The governments very own MHRA Yellow card reporting system has to date recorded over 1600 deaths and over 1.5 million adverse reactions. This needs halted immediately and a public discussion on the reported dangers of the covid 19 vaccines.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Do not vaccinate children against COVID-19 until Phase 3 trials are complete
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586017
